mutants.code:
def quicksort_descending(arr):
    stack = [(0, len(arr) - 1)]
    while stack:
        (start, end) = stack.pop()
        if start >= end:
            continue
        pivot = arr[end]
        i = start - 1
        for j in range(start, end):
            if arr[j] >= pivot:
                i += 1
                (arr[i], arr[j]) = (arr[j], arr[i])
        i -= 1
        (arr[i], arr[end]) = (arr[end], arr[i])
        stack.append((start, i - 1))
        stack.append((i + 1, end))
    return arr

    return arr

def quicksort_descending(arr):
    stack = [(0, len(arr) - 1)]
    while stack:
        (start, end) = stack.pop()
        if start >= end:
            continue
        pivot = arr[end]
        i = start - 1
        for j in range(start, end):
            if arr[j] >= pivot:
                i += 1
                (arr[i], arr[j]) = (arr[j], arr[i])
        i += 1
        (arr[i], arr[end]) = (arr[end], arr[i])
        stack.append((start, i - 1))
        stack.append((i + -1, end))
    return arr
